author: adammurdoch
msg: Fix unit tests for change to getParent() for root of a file system.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Get unit tests to work when using maven beta7.

author: adammurdoch
msg: - The root of a Zip/Jar file system is now treated as a folder.
- getParent() on the root of a layered file system returns the parent

author: adammurdoch
msg: Start untangling and simplifying the providers:
- Split 2 subclasses out of AbstractFileSystemProvider, one for originating
providers (file:, ftp:, etc), and one for layered providers (zip:, jar:, etc).
- Moved URI parsing up from ZipFileSystemProvider, so that it is available

author: adammurdoch
msg: - Moved FileSystem from vfs.provider to vfs package.
- Replaced FileObject.getRoot() and getParentLayer() with getFileSystem().
